attributes.action: Update the Union flag to represent Wales.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Welsh nation is at the current time unrepresented on the Union flag, wheeras England, Scotland and Northern Ireland are. Considering that devolution is successful and the fact that many feel it is time to put the past behind us, that it is moral correct and fair to represent all the nations of the United Kingdom on the symbol of Britain - The Union Flag.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
